amendment.description: Amendment limits the Fish and Wildlife Service to the purchase of 54 passenger vehicles rather than 59 police-type and 88 replacement vehicles; strikes language that allows the FWS from accepting donated aircraft as replacements; reduces the FWS resource management account by $885,000; and increases the appropriation for operation of Indian Programs by $851,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment that limits the Fish and Wildlife Service to the purchase of 54 passenger vehicles rather than 59 police-type and 88 replacement vehicles, strikes language that allows the FWS from accepting donated aircraft as replacements, reduces the FWS resource management account by $885,000, and increases the appropriation for operation of Indian Programs by $851,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 117 (Roll no. 510).
